subject: Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Players and coaches in N.C.A.A. men’s basketball have no clear idea what to expect from a remapped basketball court where 3-pointers may turn into 2-pointers.
snippet: Players and coaches in N.C.A.A. men’s basketball have no clear idea what to expect from a remapped basketball court where 3-pointers may turn into 2-pointers.
